amendment.description: To require the Assistant Secretary for the Transportation Security Administration to submit to Congress a security plan for Essential Air Service airports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4946 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4946 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To require the Assistant Secretary for the Transportation Security Administration to submit to Congress a security plan for Essential Air Service airports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4946 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4946 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns.
